title: Edward Hopper Nighthawks T-Shirt
description:
T-Shirt developed from Edward Hopper’s Nighthawks, 1942, from The Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

One of the best-known images of twentieth-century art, the painting depicts an all-night diner in which three customers, all lost in their own thoughts, have congregated.

  • Size: S, M, L, XL, XXL
  • Material: 100% cotton
  • Care Instructions: Machine washable.
